content: and attach the cheeks on it 4 сopyright 2021 @annaforespatterns all rights reserved 1 sew the arms to the body between row 28 and 29 at a distance of 10 single_crochet 2 attach the head to the body 3 we sew the wings to the body as shown by the lines in the photo sew them between the row 23-29 4 your bee shofi is ready now thanks for buying my pattern if you publish the photo with a ready toy on instagram account mention @annaforespatterns #pattern_annafores please i will be very grateful to you if you leave a review on this pattern if you have any questions in the process e-mail me instagram @annaforespatterns mail anna mozhaeva 94@mail ru have a cozy day anna fores @annaforespatterns 5
